name: Super Zomb Bros.
description:
Click the green flag to restart (yes its made in scratch)

I made this game in 30 MINUTES. It's all original music, art, and code, so try it out, it's kinda fun.

STORY:

You wake up. Your skin is green, covered with maggots. You forget how to talk. You forget who you are. All you know is a craving for BRAINS!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Arrow keys to move

Space to eat a human

Don't let the score reach 0!
